titles.title: Securing General Aviation and Commercial Charter Air Carrier Service Act of 2017
Securing General Aviation and Commercial Charter Air Carrier Service Act of 2017
Securing General Aviation and Commercial Charter Air Carrier Service Act of 2017
To improve and streamline security procedures related to general aviation and commercial charter air carrier utilizing risk-based security standards, and for other purposes.
Securing General Aviation and Commercial Charter Air Carrier Service Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Homeland Security.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Homeland Security. H. Rept. 115-346.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 250.
